notes.message: Use label text for image title when label is hidden (thanks @michaelroper).
Added support for PHP 5.3 to fancy options fields (text size and colours).
Fixed a bug where fancy options fields (text size and colours) were not showing if there was no default option selected.
Added more images for use with Buttons.
Added a ‘Display full width’ option that allows button groups to flow full with.
Fixed a bug where the stars weren’t getting their selected state when disabled.
Fixed a bug where the stars were appearing in the wrong order.
Added a ‘Display as graphic’ option that allows the buttons to go to the height of the provided images.
Text Size and Colours now use native Craft js and so don't interfere with Live Preview or cause other problems.
